properties.displayName: Potential Unquoted Service Path Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " service get " and ProcessCommandLine contains "name,displayname,pathname,startmode") and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "wmic.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\WMIC.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects known WMI recon method to look for unquoted service paths using wmic. Often used by pentester and attacker enumeration scripts
